title: Able to use skins that I don't own in dynamic queue
body: Not really a bad thing, but still a bug nonetheless.  When I swap champions with someone else, I sometimes gain the ability to use skins I don't own.  In a recent game, I swapped Corki for Lissandra with a teammate.  I was able to use the blade queen lissandra skin, even though I don't own it.  Not really sure how exactly it is reproduced.

replies.body: This is a know bug that will be fixed in 6.2
Correct! (Ward skins will able to be swapped again as well.)
